subject: Baseball
Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Cliff Lee will be in the Bronx on Tuesday night, under a microscope as he pitches against the Yankees. LeBron James will be in Ohio on Thursday, listening to pitches instead of swinging at them.
snippet: Cliff Lee will be in the Bronx on Tuesday night, under a microscope as he pitches against the Yankees. LeBron James will be in Ohio on Thursday, listening to pitches instead of swinging at them.
